participant_1.name: Mark Thompson
participant_1.background: i work fulltime in a shipyard. i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i'm ex military. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Creative, adventurous, and a bit impulsive.
participant_2.background: i dye my hair every three months. my dream in life is to work from home. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.
